title: Honoured After Remake

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I was just honoured after a remake ranked game, and the screenshot I added shows.
I'm guessing it's a bug since in the chat, it says everyone on my team honoured when I didn't nor get the honour screen after the game.
I wonder if this honour counts and if it's happened to other players.


(Sorry but I couldn't create this discussion in the appropriate category)

replies.body:
Weird! I've noticed a similar bug happen when someone was honored and then entered a *practice game* and then they received an honor in the practice game....where they were alone....

It sounds like this is some kind of weird visual bug where the honor is being carried over into the next game. I'm going to save this screenshot to pass along to some people who should be able to get this figured out, but if you encounter this again please post it over in Report a Bug or shoot us a ticket as well!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=vYKEemXq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-23T02:28:10.049+0000)
>
> Weird! I've noticed a similar bug happen when someone was honored and then entered a *practice game* and then they received an honor in the practice game....where they were alone....
> 
> It sounds like this is some kind of weird visual bug where the honor is being carried over into the next game. I'm going to save this screenshot to pass along to some people who should be able to get this figured out, but if you encounter this again please post it over in Report a Bug or shoot us a ticket as well!

No reason for me to lose my flair if it's a remake :3 I mean I need my teamates to know I'm awesome :D
